"kotlin冒泡排序codevar val 点这里开始冒泡"
"this is a paragraph \nthat would cover more than\ntwo lines."
"ဟ ယ်လို\nဟယ်လို ယ်လို"
"สวัสดี ชาวโลก\nสวัสดีชาวโ ลก"

> Paragraphs starting with "\>" are quotes. 
Lines starting with * or + are bullet points:
* Point one
+ Point two, where nested text enclosed in quotes is transformed in `code` block
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions.
This app may not work correctly without the %s permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.

Returned from app settings to MainActivity with the following permissions: 
 
Camera: %s 
Location & Contacts: %s 
SMS: %s 
Storage: %s
This app needs access to your camera so you can take pictures.
This app needs access to your sms to read all your great messages.
This app needs access to your storage to save your modified picture on gallery.
This app needs access to your location and contacts to know where and who you are.
